sections.heading: Short title.Section 72-14A-2 - Definition
sections.text:
Sections 1 through 5 [72-14A-1 to 72-14A-5 NMSA 1978] of this act may be cited as the "Water Security Planning Act".

History:Laws 2023, ch. 123, § 1.

Effective dates.— Laws 2023, ch. 123 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 16, 2023, 90 days after adjournment of the legislature.

sections.heading: Definition.
sections.text:
As used in the Water Security Planning Act, "commission" means the interstate stream commission.

History:Laws 2023, ch. 123, § 2.

Effective dates.— Laws 2023, ch. 123 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 16, 2023, 90 days after adjournment of the legislature.

sections.heading: Condemnation of water rights.
sections.text:
Nothing in the Water Security Planning Act shall be construed as permitting the condemnation of water rights or as determining, abridging or affecting in any way the water rights of water right owners in the state.

History:Laws 2023, ch. 123, § 3.

Effective dates.— Laws 2023, ch. 123 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 16, 2023, 90 days after adjournment of the legislature.

sections.heading: Water planning funding; regional water planning; rules; guidelines.
